title: Can you give a random fact that is worth a 1000+ upvotes? - Quora

This Midblowing Photograph Shows us how sunsets Appears From above the Clouds, Seems like Clouds are on 🔥 Fire. Please Upvote this Post……… (Source: Internet)

Olympic medals used to be awarded for painting, sculpture, literature, and music.  ** Mahonri Young won a gold medal for his sculpture, The Knockdown, during the 1932 Olympic games in Los Angeles.  ** The gold medal awarded during the tenth Olympiad in LA in 1932. Medals were awarded for artistic competitions during the first four decades of the modern games. One hundred and fifty-one of these medals were awarded between 1912 and 1952. Today, hardly anyone remembers that fact. There was one catch, each artistic entry had to in some way be inspired by and embody the spirit of sport.
